attributes.action: Establish voting constituencies for expatriate citizens, enabling them to elect Members of Parliament to represent the interests of overseas citizens.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Many British citizens live overseas and no longer have their own MP to represent their interests. Italy recently gave an example for other countries to follow by establishing special constituencies for non-resident citizens. These citizens elect Members of Parliament, sitting in the national parliament, and brining the needs of non-resident citizens before the parliament.
